subject: Tracking no for order #SSN6077
description_text:
Hi mate,

Can I have a tracking number please for order:
#SSN6077

Order is paid and confirmed on 13 Jan 2026. But the status of my order
still looks Unfulfilled.

Best regards
Mihai

mihaitastanescu@gmail.com
+4 0741 233711

conversations.body_text: Hi Mihai Stanescu,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
